name: Sonic Pulse
description:
This game is a product of the Global Game Jam 2017. Expect bugs and a terrible control layout. You will need to use Xbox controllers.

Killing enemies with your gun to gain points. The red arrow to the right of your player leads you to power ups.

Controls:

A - Jump

X - Throw grenade

Right Bumper - Shoots gun

Left Joystick button - activate sprint

Joysticks to move and look around.
